alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 1:07PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Suwannee and central Hamilton Counties through 145 PM EST... At 107 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crossroads to near Dowling Park. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Jasper, Suwannee Springs, Dowling Park, Luraville and Newburn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
